page.title: 08Leisure in the Colne Valley
page.content: In our area there are many types of leisure.There are a few brass bands,and once a year all the bands get together for a competition. In Slaithwaite there is a swimming pool.Once a week third and fourth years go down there.Near the swimming pool there is a leisure centre.They have activities like cricket,netball, football,basketball and weight training.They also have disco's,roller skating,concerts,model railway shows and a bar.The leisure centre is used in the day time by senior citizens for dances. There are several cricket and bowling clubs.There is a golf course at Crosland Heath with a club house.
